mapper.select: select distinct TOI.ID AS ID, TOI.ORG_NAME AS TEXT, TOI.Parent_Id as parentId, toi.org_type || '' as type, case when toi.org_type = 4 then toi.parent_Id when toi.org_type = 3 then toi.id else null end as buId, case when toi.org_type = 4 then (select t.parent_Id from TAB_ORGANIZATION_INFO t where id = toi.parent_Id) when toi.org_type = 3 then (select t.id from TAB_ORGANIZATION_INFO t where id = toi.parent_Id) when toi.org_type = 2 then toi.id end as cityId from TAB_ORGANIZATION_INFO toi LEFT JOIN TAB_ORGANIZATION_INFO TOI2 ON TOI2.ID = TOI.Parent_Id and toi2.STATUS = 1 where toi.STATUS = 1 order by TEXT asc

select distinct toi.id as ID, toi.org_name as TEXT, toi.parent_Id as parentId, toi.org_type||'' as type, case when toi.org_type = 4 then toi.parent_Id when toi.org_type = 3 then toi.id else null end as buId, case when toi.org_type = 4 then (select t.parent_Id from TAB_ORGANIZATION_INFO t where id = toi.parent_Id) when toi.org_type = 3 then (select t.id from TAB_ORGANIZATION_INFO t where id = toi.parent_Id) when toi.org_type = 2 then toi.id end as cityId, toi.product_line as productLine, toi.org_kind as orgKind from TAB_ORGANIZATION_INFO toi left join user_personal_settings ups on ups.param_val = toi.id and ups.param_name = #{paramName} where ups.user_id = #{userId}
